item.title: Starting Inv Duping problem HELP!
item.dc:creator: @kestral kestral
item.description:
@kestral wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I followed this tut and it keeps duping the starting items heres what mine looks like

public int lastlogintime; public int hitems = 0;

if (token.equals("character-height")) { heightLevel = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-hitems")) {//-fedexer- hitems = Integer.parseInt(token2);
BTW the else part wasnt there to start with :S

characterfile.write("character-lastlogintime = ", 0, 26); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(playerLastLogin), 0, Integer.toString(playerLastLogin).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-hitems = ", 0, 19);// -fedexer- characterfile.write(Integer.toString(hitems), 0, Integer.toString(hitems).length()); characterfile.newLine();

public void startingitems() {//-fedexer-'s coding hitems = 1; addItem(1079, 1); addItem(1127, 1); addItem(1163, 1); addItem(7337, 1); addItem(1333, 1); addItem(995, 100000); }

//openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 3, ((IPPart1 << 24)+(IPPart2 << 16)+(IPPart3 << 8)+IPPart4), lastlogintime); MainHelpMenu(); //openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 3, (127 << 24)+1, misc.random(10)); if(hitems == 0) //creds to -fedexer- for this { startingitems(); }else{ sendMessage("no starter items for you (made by -fedexer-) "); }

ok thats what ive done is there any stupid errors there that ive done or not followed correctly please help[br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2007, 05:31:10 PM[/size][hr]Some help please[br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2007, 06:00:12 PM[/size][hr]HEEEEELP[br][size=1]Posted on: March 16, 2007, 10:52:36 AM[/size][hr]Why wont anyone help me.
